answers.author: Maxwell Moline
answers.text:
Cathy,
Very few cities have specific policies on how employees are supposed to post about work in their personal time. Most cities forbid employees from using social media for any purpose other than specific business projects during the work day, and some cities have sanctioned specific departments to be allowed to use such sites based on the purposes and jobs of those departments.
The City of Reno, NV has a policy (attach) that will likely be made official within the next month that says that employees can say what they want about the city on their own time, as long as they specify that it is a personal belief and not on behalf of the city.
Hope this helps!
